name: A Set of Bronze Kote [fading]
data: It increases the users strength poorly.
It increases the users dexterity nicely.
It decreases the users wisdom poorly.
It decreases the users intelligence poorly.
It has awesome armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration pitifully.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration pathetically.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'throw'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'slash'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'strike'.
It gives tiny bonus to the skill 'zhinakoku'.
The Bronze Kote modifies the user's skills.
